name: Rea Lity: The Man in Black
name_original: Rea Lity: The Man in Black
description:
All is not as it seems at Area 51. A mysterious army of Aliens have taken over and disguised themselves as operatives! It's up to Rea Lity, the worst shot in the agency to save the day....    One might say...   Special Agent Rea Lity, is often inaccurate.

Controller Required! Twinstick Shooter, One Bullet per enemy! You miss, they eat you!

This is my first Solo Project, hope you have some fun with it! :)

Music and some SFX aren't mine and were found on Freesound.org and Soundimage
